TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to John Austin, 08-06-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to John Austin, Mexico, August 6, 1833. Thinks State organization will be granted Texas. Must be a State either of Mexico or of the United States. Cholera epidemic.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to John Austin, Mexico, August 6, 1833. Thinks State organization will be granted Texas. Must be a State either of Mexico or of the United States. Cholera epidemic.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[From Williams Papers, Rosenberg Library, Galveston, Tex.]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-06-1833">Augt. 6. 1833*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*John*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*I recd yours of *date_mentioned n="06-24-1833">24 June*/date_mentioned* by last mail—hope to get another letter soon—this is the only one I have recd since I left. Has *person_mentioned*Williams*/person_mentioned* returned—or is there no one there who remembers me so far as to drop me a line to say that the few ties that are left to bind me to life are still alive you say they have been sick (my *person_mentioned*sister */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*) but you say nothing of *person_mentioned*Stephen */person_mentioned*or anyone else*/p*.
*p*I think the decision of *person_mentioned*Congress */person_mentioned*will be in favor of a *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned*, but I fear they will send it to the *location_mentioned*other States*/location_mentioned* for their approbation, this will cause some delay, tho my *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*here think it will be dispatched by the*date_mentioned n="01-01-1834"> first of January*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I have had a hard trip so far and have more difficulties to work through here than you can well form an idea of—but I hope to get along and that *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*will be a *location_mentioned*State */location_mentioned*of this, or the *location_mentioned*U. S. republic*/location_mentioned* before another year, for I am so weary, that life is hardly worth having situated as we now are.*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*vice President*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*ministers */person_mentioned*profess great friendship for *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*and say that their measures will be very different from the last *person_mentioned*administration*/person_mentioned*. I think they are sincere—but time will show. There are conflicting interests—or what are supposed to be so by some persons, that I fear will do harm—one article in the constitution which in reality means next thing to nothing I fear will do some harm.*/p*
*p*Send word to *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*that I am well.*/p*
*p*The cholora is at hand and very fatal. So I bid you farewell in case this should be the last.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. A.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Address:] Al *person_mentioned*Sor Don Samuel M. Williams*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
